metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3847 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An unauthorized access to the execution of the setuid file with capabilities flaw in the Linux kernel OverlayFS subsystem was found in the way user copying a capable file from a nosuid mount into another mount. A local user could use this flaw to escalate their privileges on the system.

notes.Note: sbeattie> Miklos, a primary maintainer for overlayfs, asserts in the SUSE bug that this is a misunderstanding of how overlayfs operates.

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
